data.enText: a plan of action agreed or chosen by a political party, a business, etc.
the present government's policy on education

data.chText: 那家公司对店内行窃采取了严厉的措施。
data.enText: The company has adopted a firm policy on shoplifting.
We have tried to pursue a policy of neutrality.

data.chText: 美国的外交 / 内政政策
他们对男人休产假制度作出了重大改变。
data.enText: They have had a significant change in policy on paternity leave.
a principle that you believe in that influences how you behave; a way in which you usually behave

data.chText: 她遵循着自己的一贯原则，对于他人的主动帮助一概不予理睬。
data.enText: She is following her usual policy of ignoring all offers of help.
a written statement of a contract of insurance

data.chText: 仔细阅读保险单的条款后再签字。
data.enText: Check the terms of the policy before you sign.

simple_means.memory_skill: polic 国家，引申为“政治” + y 表结果 → 对国家的管理 → 政策

ex.en: policy change ( or change of policy)

tr: a plan of action adopted by an individual or social group
example: it was a policy of retribution
a politician keeps changing his policies

tr: written contract or certificate of insurance
example: you should have read the small print on your policy

tr: a line of argument rationalizing the course of action of a government
example: they debated the policy or impolicy of the proposed legislation

value.def: A policy is a set of ideas or plans that is used as a basis for making decisions, especially in politics, economics, or business.

example.ex: ...plans which include changes in foreign policy and economic reforms.
example.tran: 包括转变外交政策和改革经济的计划

value.tran: （尤指政治、经济或商业方面的）政策，方针，策略

value.def: An official organization's policy on a particular issue or towards a country is their attitude and actions regarding that issue or country.

example.ex: ...the organisation's future policy towards South Africa.
example.tran: 该组织未来对南非的政策

example.ex: ...the corporation's policy of forbidding building on common land.
example.tran: 该市政当局禁止在公共用地上建房的立场

value.tran: （针对某一问题或某国的）政策，态度，行动

value.def: An insurance policy is a document which shows the agreement that you have made with an insurance company.

example.ex: You are advised to read the small print of household and motor insurance policies.
example.tran: 建议阅读家庭财产和汽车保险单中的附属细则。

trans: 外交政策期刊；外交政策；对外政策；外交政策杂志；外交
保险单据；保險單；大保单；保险政策；保险条款
环境政策；環境政策；环境方针；环保政策
价格政策；定价政策；价格策略；定价策略；收费策略
股利政策；分红政策；股息政策；红利政策
总保（险）单；总括保（险）单；一揽子保（险）单
质量方针；品质方针；质量政策；品质政策；的质量方针
开放政策；不定值保险合同（契约）；开口保险单，未确定保单；预约保险单；缩略词为OP
政策支撑；政策支持；政策扶持；政策指导

rootsaffixes.indicate: = state, city 国家, 城市 , 引申为“政治”
rootsaffixes.title: polic, polit, polis

partsOfSpeech.dec: cosmo 世界 + polis 国家，城市，引申为“政治” → 世界性城市 → 国际都市
metro 母亲 + polis 国家，城市，引申为“政治” → 母亲城 → 大城市
polic 国家，城市，引申为“政治” + e → 管理城市的人 → 警察
polic 国家，城市，引申为“政治” + y 表结果 → 对国家的管理 → 政策
polit 国家，城市，引申为“政治” + ician 表人 → 搞政治之人 → 政客
polit 国家，城市，引申为“政治” + ics …学 → 政治；政治学
